import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Add Login IP Allow List</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/ip_allow_list_login"}></MethodEndpoint>



Adds a named list of CIDRs (IP addresses) that are in the allow list to access Prisma Cloud. You can add up to 10 CIDRs per named list, and there can be up to 50 named lists.

## Request

<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3><strong className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":"1rem","marginBottom":"1rem"}}>

Model for login IP allow list parameters

</div></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"cidr"} required={true} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"List of CIDRs to Allow List for login access. You can include from 1 to 10 CIDRs","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"description"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Description of CIDR (IP addresses) allow list","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"name"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Unique name for CIDR (IP addresses) allow list","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

successful operation

Login IP Allow List is enabled.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"description"} required={false} schemaName={"string"}
